subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When the Reds’ Edwin Encarnación came to bat in the bottom of the 10th against Brewers closer Eric Gagné, the rain-chilled fans left in the stands began to boo.
snippet: When the Reds’ Edwin Encarnación came to bat in the bottom of the 10th against Brewers closer Eric Gagné, the rain-chilled fans left in the stands began to boo.
